function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Underestimation of the infection fatality rate due to uncounted deaths and undiagnosed infections","Impact":"Misleading public health policies and interventions","Mitigation":"Implement widespread and accurate testing, monitor and count all deaths related to the virus","Technologies":"Diagnostic tests, surveillance tools for tracking deaths and infections","People":"General population, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health agencies, government"},{"Description":"Misinterpretation of epidemic curve as exponential community spread, influenced by availability of test kits and willingness for testing","Impact":"False perception of the true epidemic growth, leading to inappropriate intervention measures","Mitigation":"Increase testing capacity, improve access to test kits, educate the public on the importance of testing","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, communication tools for public education","People":"General population, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health agencies, government"},{"Description":"Implementation of extreme measures of unknown effectiveness in response to alarming circumstances","Impact":"Disruption to social and economic activities without clear effectiveness, potential for public unrest","Mitigation":"Evaluate the effectiveness of measures, consider alternative interventions with proven impact, communicate transparently with the public","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, communication platforms for public engagement","People":"General population, government authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, government"}]}
